short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark any area of a web page and automatically add the link to a comment in your ticket.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making comments in UX apps like Invision and Adobe XD restricts those comments to those applications, losing valuable information in your ticket management tools like GitKracken's Glo. With GloCommentTags you can mark any web page and add a comment to your Blo Board ticket.
